game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the ancient ruins
game.description: You have been given a map and directions to the location of an ancient artifact. Your objective is to locate and retrieve this artifact.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a rare magic item

task.objective: Find the map in your inventory
task.description: Look for the hand-drawn map in your inventory. It should reveal the location of the ruins.

task.objective: Locate the entrance of the ruins
task.description: Use the map to navigate through the forest and find the entrance to the ruins.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and retrieve the artifact
task.description: The ruins are bound to be filled with traps and maybe even monsters. Be careful as you explore them and keep an eye out for the artifact.
